name: print-tax
description: A tax invoice transaction has the following elements. - customer Id for instance `123` - commercial invoice number that would look like `2021/04/customer1-12212`  - timestamp - of format ```year-month-dayThour:minute:second``` - amount - of format ```dollars.cents``` - tax type which could be the following: GST, PAYROLL, COMPANY_TAX, LAND_TAX, CAPITOL_GAIN
